TopicTitle: [Annoyance] Auto-Saved Ship in Launch New Mission

Articles.Content:
So this is a really big annoyance for me. Not sure when this was changed, but the Auto-Saved ship used to be notated on the Launch New Mission Window.

Meaning if you click the Pad or Runway directly to launch a craft, the Auto-Saved ship has the SAME name as the ship that was manually saved. When loading a craft it has [Auto-Saved Ship] at the end of the name, so you can recognize which one it is. However, there is no such label or any form of identification of which craft is which. This gets annoying as I may have made a change and end up loading the wrong one when I go to launch, just to find out I clicked the wrong one.

As you can see (or not see to be precise), these two craft are actually different, but which one is which?

So my suggestion would to either have it show the [Auto-Saved Ship], which could get cut off with long names.
Or better, Italicize the name, or just have it say "Auto-Saved Ship" (then maybe the name after that for reference).
